WebringName.title: Webring Name
WebringName.description: Specify the name of your site's webring. By default, the webring is unnamed. The navigation label is `Webring` and the header for the site member list is `Members of the Webring`. This value can be overridden on a per-webring basis by setting the **name** parameter in the webring's `_index.md` file.

RandomMemberLink.title: Enable Random Member Link
RandomMemberLink.description: Specify whether the webring member navigation pages should include a link to navigate to the homepage of a random member of the webring.

Theme.title: Theme for Webring Member Navigation Pages
Theme.description: Specify whether the webring member navigation pages should use a custom theme or the built-in light mode, dark mode, or automatic themes. The automatic theme switches between modes based on user's browser/os preferences. If using a custom theme, you need to shadow the `assets/toroidal/_custom.scss` file in your project.
